name: Cast Adrift (DDXC)
description:
I made this game for my project. Give it a try and do give a feedback :D

The storyline starting from 3 explorers exploring unknown area. The other 2 went missing. The player has to somehow survive and find them or at least find a way out.

One thing I need to mention about this game is that the enemies have a bit unique behaviour. Anyways, Good Luck and Have Fun!

One final thing. Please do answer the survey after playing it. The link will be inside the game. I will appreciate it.
